panels.description: This KPI shows the average value of the Physical Resource Block (PRB) utilization per TTI in downlink direction per PLMN. The utilization is defined by the ratio of used to available PRBs per TTI.
panels.title: LTE_8072a E-UTRAN average PRB usage per TTI DL per PLMN [%]

panels.description: This KPI shows the minimum value of the Physical Resource Block (PRB) utilization per TTI in downlink direction per PLMN. The utilization is defined by the ratio of used to available PRBs per TTI.
panels.title: LTE_8073a E-UTRAN minimum PRB usage per TTI DL per PLMN [%]

panels.description: This KPI shows the maximum value of the Physical Resource Block (PRB) utilization per TTI in downlink direction per PLMN. The utilization is defined by the ratio of used to available PRBs per TTI.
panels.title: LTE_8074a E-UTRAN maximum PRB usage per TTI DL per PLMN [%]

panels.description: This KPI shows the average value of the Physical Resource Block (PRB) utilization per TTI in uplink direction per PLMN. The utilization is defined by the ratio of used to available PRBs per TTI.
panels.title: LTE_8077a E-UTRAN average PRB usage per TTI UL per PLMN [%]

panels.description: This KPI shows the minimum value of the Physical Resource Block (PRB) utilization per TTI in uplink direction per PLMN. The utilization is defined by the ratio of used to available PRBs per TTI.
panels.title: LTE_8078a E-UTRAN minimum PRB usage per TTI UL per PLMN [%]

panels.description: This KPI shows the maximum value of the Physical Resource Block (PRB) utilization per TTI in uplink direction per PLMN. The utilization is defined by the ratio of used to available PRBs per TTI.
panels.title: LTE_8079a E-UTRAN maximum PRB usage per TTI UL per PLMN [%]
